Hi,

I am currently using Junit 4.1. I have a requirement in which i need to get
the session before any junit class starts execution. I can not do this at
@BeforeClass level.

I need to do this at TestSuite Level.

My test suite looks like

import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.junit.runners.Suite;

@RunWith(Suite.class)
@...( {EmployeeTest.class,DepartmentTest.class})
public class EmployeeTestAMAllTests {
}

I need to instantiate session before EmployeeTest  and destroy it post
DepartmentTest. I can certainly write this in @BeforeClass of EmployeeTest &
@AfterClass of DepartmentTest, but this would not resolve the issue.

I want a generalized solution, in which even if I dont know the starting and
end Junit classes, the instantiation and destruction process should run
independently.


Thanks In Advance


Regards
Deepankar
